description: Try a twist on a family favourite with this vegetarian lasagne recipe. This hearty dinner layered with juicy eggplant, pasta, cheese and herbs will not disappoint.
name: Eggplant, Parmesan & Basil Lasagne Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Grease a 15 x 22cm (5cm deep) rectangular baking dish.

Heat 2 tbs oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook half the eggplant for 2 minutes on each side or until golden and tender. Transfer to a plate. Repeat with another 2 tbs oil and remaining eggplant.

Heat remaining oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Cook onion, stirring, for 2 minutes or until softened. Add garlic and cook, stirring, for 1 minute or until fragrant. Add passata, 3/4 cup water, oregano, sugar and vinegar, then bring to the boil. Reduce heat to medium and simmer, uncovered, for 15 minutes or until sauce thickens slightly. Stir in basil and season.

Spread 1/2 cup sauce over base of dish. Top with a layer of eggplant. Scatter one-third of the parmesan and one-third of the mozzarella, then cover with a layer of lasagne sheets, cutting to fit. Repeat process, finishing with the remaining sauce, parmesan and mozzarella. Sprinkle with breadcrumbs.
Bake for 30 minutes or until lasagne is golden and tender when pierced with a small knife. Stand for 10 minutes, then serve topped with extra basil leaves.
